entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Medicine Hat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:45 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Medicine Hat Airport 06:09 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
